column1: Originally it was Hador who led the people of the third house of the Edain across the Ered Luin into Beleriand
column2: this was changed so that Hador became Marachs descendant of the fourth generation.

column1: *http://middle-earth.xenite.org/2013/10/01/what-is-the-meaning-of-marach/ What Is the Meaning of Marach? by Michael Martinez
